item.title: Are You Making This Common Mistake When You Spell 'Environment'? Find Out Now!
item.description: Introduction Do you ever find yourself making a common mistake when you spell “environment”? If so, you’re not alone! In this blog post, we’ll explain the most common mistake people make when spelling “environment,” and provide tips for avoiding it. Definition of “Environment” Before we get into the common mistake people make when spelling “environment,” let’s take a moment to define the word. The environment is the sum total of all the physical, chemical, and biological factors that influence an organism’s life.
